Package main.monster

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
main.monster.Monster
public class Monster extends Object
This class implements a Monster which can be purchased by the player using the shop class adding the Monster to the player's squad. A Monster is also part of the team of an enemy's squad which the player fights using their squad of Monsters.
Version:
1.1, May 2022.
Author:
Lucas Redding, Celeste Turnock

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster(String name, int level, int maxHealth, int attackDamage, int healAmount, String rarity)
      Creates a new Monster based on given parameters. Sets the variables of the Monster based on what is passed to constructor. Health is set to full and isFainted is set to false. The purchase price and level up bonus are set based on the rarity given. The resell price is set to half the purchase price. For every level in the amount of levels passed to the function the levelUp function is called to randomly upgrade one of the Monsters stats.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Monster.
      level - the level of the Monster.
      maxHealth - the maximum health of the Monster.
      attackDamage - the attack damage of the Monster.
      healAmount - the amount by which the Monster heals when healed.
      rarity - the rarity of the Monster.

      Parameters:

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Increases the level of this Monster by one. Randomly decides on which of the three upgradable stats to increase when leveling up and increases that stat by the level up bonus of this Monster.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Decreases this Monster's health by a given amount of damage. If this Monster's health ends up at zero or less the isFainted variable will become true to show this Monster is no longer conscious.
      Parameters:
      damage - the damage for the current health to be reduced by.

    • getIsFainted

      public boolean getIsFainted()
      Gets whether the monster has fainted or not.
      Returns:
      whether the monster has fainted or not.

    • heal

      public void heal()
      Heals this Monster's current Health by its heal amount. Ensures that this Monster is no longer fainted. If this Monster is healed beyond its max health the current health is set to the max health.

    • getPurchasePrice

      public int getPurchasePrice()
      Gets the purchase price of this monster.
      Returns:
      the integer purchase price of the monster

    • getResellPrice

    • toString
